column1: Little Goat Diner////Our food offered memorable flavors
column3: and deft execution. Fried pickles and onion rings melted in the mouth with an airy texture and light crispness
column4: pairing beautifully with accompanying curry mayo and house ranch. The pork belly pancake could've used more scallions
column5: but was nonetheless intensely flavored with bitter bok choy slaw
column7: and hoisin sauce tying everything together. My bulls-eye French toast tasted revelatory
column8: balancing the sweetness of strawberries and smoky barbecue syrup with eggy brioche
column11: runny eggs. The dish brought an ideal combination of sweet-savory flavors and textures.
